Name: Neon Beats
About the game: Neon Beats is a 2D side view platformer game in which the player will evolve in different levels that are rhythmed by catchy musics . Complete levels as quickly as possible! Gather several hidden collectibles! Brave different challenging obstacles! In Neon Beats , you will find : 4 different levels with it's own music Rhythm based gameplay A character with smooth and responsive controls Simple and elegant neon ambiance Several challenging level elements Hidden collectibles adding instruments to the music A score system based on your time, collectibles and deaths
